scenario_text.value:
Dammit! Did the Master’s cronies do this,
too? The heck’d they come here for?!
I was wondering that myself.
Hrmm? Could this be...?
What is it, Falcomon?

I scouted around the area, but all of the
fallen are gathered in the same areas.

Almost like breadcrumbs left in the enemy’s
wake.

Are you saying the enemy is heading someplace
and attacked anyone who got in their way?

You’re kidding... They’d do all this just
’cause someone happened to cross their path?

(Minoru... Is he sad, or angry? Probably
a little bit of both.)
Can you “throw down,” Minoru?
You know it. I’m ready to bust some heads!

(Man, Minoru really has gotten stronger.
Think I’ll give him a pep talk.)
(What should I say to him?)
We’ll save ’em all!
Gotta stop the Master.
Let’s stay cool.
We’ll save ’em all!
We’ll save ’em all!
Yeah! That includes Miyuki, of course.
Yeah. Thanks, Minoru.
Gotta stop the Master.
Gotta stop the Master.
Right. That’ll save our world, too.
That means it’s a no-brainer!
Let’s stay cool.

Hey Minoru, let’s keep a cool head about
this.

Don’t sweat it, Takuma. Do I look like I’m
about to bust a gasket to you?

Minoru has gained quite the pluck as of late.
No need to be concerned about him.
Yeah? My bad for worrying over nothing.

Naw man, seeing you holding it down as always
helps me keep my eye on the prize.
Come on, let’s do this, Falcomon!

Indeed, I’m right behind you. Do whatever
your heart tells you!

(He really has become someone to rely on. I’d
better follow suit!)

No clue when we’ll be attacked. Better keep
our eyes and ears open.
